surname Huang or Hwang

emperor

the Xirong, an ancient ethnic group of Western China from the Zhou Dynasty onwards/Xionites (Central Asian nomads)
one of the five legendary emperors, also called 嚳|喾[Ku4]
Suirenshi, legendary inventor of fire
final name of the Shang dynasty after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
